content:
/>
XIV.4.D.8.a
.
Payer’s Report Only
When the income payer responds, but the recipient does not respond to the income match query, send a notice of proposed adverse action based on the payer’s report.
Reference
:  For more information on the efforts to clarify disputed amounts, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.D.12
.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
